headline: Viatris Gains China Approval for COPD Drug Yupelri, Triggers $7.5M Payment to Theravance BioPharma
summary: Viatris Inc. (NASDAQ:VTRS) is one of the best low priced pharma stocks to buy now. On June 27, Viatris received approval from China’s National Medical Products Administration/NMPA for Yupelri (revefenacin) inhalation solution for the maintenance treatment of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease/COPD. Yupelri is the first ever once-daily nebulized long-acting muscarinic antagonist/LAMA approved in China for […]

headline: Viatris Certified as a Great Place to Work® in Canada
summary: Viatris Inc. (Nasdaq: VTRS) has been certified as a Great Place to Work® in Canada. This recognition highlights Viatris' commitment to fostering a culture where colleagues are enthusiastic about the work they do and feel valued, engaged and motivated.
